Name: The Other: Airi's Adventure
About the game: A 15-year-old girl named Airi somehow walked into another world. In this fantasy world she, and her school mate Luca, were going to have a great adventure. > Join the Rabbiton Discord! > Vista compatibility mode). - If the game runs poorly (or doesn't run at all) on your PC, you may consider the Light version without the Steam achievements. It's included in your local game folder as a zip file, or it can be purchased on itch.io. - The DLCs can be purchased seperately on itch.io. To change languages: Select 'Option' on the title screen. + A casual JRPG + Turn-based battle system. No random encounter. + A colourful fantasy world with original art and music + Familiar faces? + Multiple ends + Outfits, classes, recepies and fishing! + A hidden room (extra) will unlock after finishing Airi's Quest. This game is developed by RabbitonBooks, a solo indie developer. Special thanks: SophiaSW Hope you enjoy it! Please follow the dev on tumblr, twiter, and weibo for more updates if you're interested!
